title: WRC Powerslide - CODEX (2014) PC [ENG]
description:
============================================
WRC Powerslide - CODEX (2014) PC [ENG]
============================================

-  ENG

============================================
Description:                               =
============================================

New and immediate gameplay: Its fast, its easy to play, its
a new way to step intro WRC world: race against 3other
opponents on the same special stage. They can be driven by AI
or your friends in multiplayer mode Enjoy new car handling
Accelerating, braking or using the handbrake in a new and
smooth way: driving fast, drifting or jumping has never been
so easy Choose also your favorite settings: by default race
against ghost car without or switching on the option, with
collisions and surprising power ups on track. these could make
the difference for your final win
